# DPomics

<p align='justify'>*ongoing*</p>

<p align='justify'>*__DPomics__*: **DP** lab **omics** visualization and integration.</p>

<p align='justify'>*DPomics* is a Shiny app designed to visualize omics data from the Pasini Lab (RNA-seq, ChIP-seq and integration.)</p>

<p align='justify'>Code available [here](https://github.com/amitjavilaventura/DPomics).</p>

![DPomics logo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/amitjavilaventura/DPomics/main/www/DPomics_logo.png)

# DNAme

<p align='justify'>*DNAme* is a Shiny app designed for learning purposes that converts a word to a DNA sequence.</p>

<p align='justify'>Code available [here](https://github.com/amitjavilaventura/DPomics).</p>

![DNAme logo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/amitjavilaventura/DNAme/main/www/DNAme_logo.png)
